long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Workbox is a smart job application tracker designed to streamline and simplify your job search process. With Workbox, you can easily manage all your applied jobs in one convenient location. This extension offers cross-browser support, ensuring that no matter where you apply, your applications are stored and accessible from any device with Chrome.

Key features include:

Efficient Application Tracking: Organize your applications by status, role, and company to monitor each opportunity’s progress.
Seamless Cross-Browser Synchronization: Keep your job data in sync across browsers for easy access wherever you go.
Secure and Private: Built with security as a priority, Workbox ensures that your data is safe and only accessible to you.
Workbox empowers job seekers to focus on what matters most—landing the next opportunity—while making job tracking easy and organized.

Workflow:
Cross-Browser Job Tracker: Track and manage job applications across multiple browsers, all in one place.
User Authentication: Secure login through an offsite authentication system, ensuring data privacy.
Seamless Job Management: Add, edit, update statuses, and delete job entries with ease.
Real-Time Sync: Jobs and updates are saved instantly in Firestore, allowing continuous access across sessions.
User-Centric Design: Simple, clean UI with easy navigation for an intuitive job-tracking experience.
